entry.title: Added My Publication List to Website

entry.content: I updated this site to include my publication list in the research section to make it easier to stay up-to-date with my work Mike’s Research

entry.title: Impact of COVID-19 on Public Transit Accessibility and Ridership

link.title: Impact of COVID-19 on Public Transit Accessibility and Ridership

entry.content:
The COVID-19 pandemic has had a major impact on public transit ridership throughout the country. Check out how it has affected Nashville and Chattanooga in our pre-print “Impact of COVID-19 on Public Transit Accessibility and Ridership”.

Paper PDF
entry.summary: The COVID-19 pandemic has had a major impact on public transit ridership throughout the country. Check out how it has affected Nashville and Chattanooga in our pre-print “Impact of COVID-19 on Public Transit Accessibility and Ridership”.

entry.title: IEEE ISORC 2020
entry.content:
I presented our paper “Time-dependent Decentralized Routing using Federated Learning” at ISORC 2020. Due to COVID-19 the conference was held virtually this year, check out the full itinerary at ISORC 2020 and my presentation at presentation

Paper PDF
entry.summary: I presented our paper “Time-dependent Decentralized Routing using Federated Learning” at ISORC 2020. Due to COVID-19 the conference was held virtually this year, check out the full itinerary at ISORC 2020 and my presentation at presentation

entry.title: IEEE ICFC 2020
entry.content: JP Talusan presented our work on decentralized route planning using road side units at the 2020 IEEE International Conference on Fog Computing (ICFC). Check out JP’s presentation at ISORC 2020.
entry.summary: JP Talusan presented our work on decentralized route planning using road side units at the 2020 IEEE International Conference on Fog Computing (ICFC). Check out JP’s presentation at ISORC 2020.

entry.title: TRB Annual Meeting 2020
entry.content: Will Barbour presented our work on data driven methods for micromobility parking at the annual meeting of the Transportation Research Board (TRB) 2020. In this work we used unsupervised machine learning approaches to identify optimal zones for designated electric scooter parking.
entry.summary: Will Barbour presented our work on data driven methods for micromobility parking at the annual meeting of the Transportation Research Board (TRB) 2020. In this work we used unsupervised machine learning approaches to identify optimal zones for designated electric scooter parking.

entry.title: IEEE SmartComp 2019
entry.content:
I presented our paper “A Decentralized Approach For Real Time Anomaly Detection In Transportation Networks” at SMARTCOMP 2019 while JP Talusan presented our work on a distributed processing middleware for smart transportation systems.

See the full 2019 SMARTCOMP schedule at smartcomp 2019 and check out links to the papers below:

Decentralized Anomaly Detection Middleware
entry.summary: I presented our paper “A Decentralized Approach For Real Time Anomaly Detection In Transportation Networks” at SMARTCOMP 2019 while JP Talusan presented our work on a distributed processing middleware for smart transportation systems.
